Required: No  
Type:

ActionGroupExecutor.title: Lambda

Lambda.markdownDescription:
ARN of a Lambda.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:lambda:[a-z]{2}(-gov)?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:\d{12}:function:[a-zA-Z0-9-_\.]+(:(\$LATEST|[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+))?$  
Update requires: No interruption

Required: No

Maximum Length: 63

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024

Update requires: No interruption
